title: Volcanic sulphur

properties.name: description
properties.value: Volcanic sulphur is a mineral that can be mined within the Lovakengj sulphur mine on the northern side. Mining volcanic sulphur requires level 42 Mining to obtain, and grants 25 Mining experience. Each sulphur mined has a 1 in 3 chance for 0.1% Lovakengj favour.[1]

content:
Not to be confused with Sulphur.
Volcanic sulphur
Released7 January 2016 (Update)
MembersYes

Advanced data
Item ID13571

Volcanic sulphur is a mineral that can be mined within the Lovakengj sulphur mine on the northern side. Mining volcanic sulphur requires level 42 Mining to obtain, and grants 25 Mining experience. Each sulphur mined has a 1 in 3 chance for 0.1% Lovakengj favour.[1]

It takes approximately 925 Sulphur to get 30% Lovakengj favour. To achieve 100% Lovakengj favour approximately 3,804 volcanic sulphur must be mined.

While mining in the sulphur mine, players must wear a form of face protection (face mask, gas mask, or slayer helmet). Without protection, gas clouds within the mine will deal rapid hits of 3-5 damage per tick to unprotected players. If the player wears any form of protection against them, the damage taken will be reduced to 1-2 per tick instead.

It is recommended to mine the volcanic sulphur deposits from the south or from the west to avoid taking excessive damage since the gas clouds cannot damage you when directly south or west of you.

Players can extend their stay at the sulphur deposits if they also wear the Hitpoints Cape and Regen Bracelet, as in combination these provide additional natural healing (+4 hp/min).

The sulphur clouds may be safespotted by luring a spider to the western-most sulphur deposit. This can be done by attacking the spider with auto-retaliate off (casting curse spells or splashing recommended). The safespot setup requires the player to stand on the west square positioned south of the western most deposit with the spider attacking from the east. This safespot works as long as you do not move, step on the spider, or others players walking on you or the spider. Mining using this safespot will not show the mining animation, but you will continue to mine.

Recommended mining safespot location at the furthest west sulphur deposit

It is recommended that OSRS Mobile players activate 'tap to drop’ (located within Mobile Controls Settings) whilst afk mining sulphur, as unwanted sulphur can be dropped quickly.

Volcanic sulphur is used along with juniper charcoal, saltpetre, and a pot to create a dynamite pot, which is then added with a ball of wool to create dynamite, an item used to participate in the blast mine.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 March 2016
(update)

Fixed a bug where dying with 26 or more volcanic sulphur in the inventory lost all untradeable items. Volcanic sulphur is now destroyed on death.

[[File:Volcanic sulphur detail.png|left|200px]]
'''Volcanic sulphur''' is a mineral that can be mined within the [[Lovakengj]] [[sulphur mine]] on the northern side. Mining volcanic sulphur requires level 42 [[Mining]] to obtain, and grants 25 Mining experience. Each sulphur mined has a 1 in 3 chance for 0.1% [[Lovakengj]] [[favour]].{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1478322503407878144|date=4 January 2022|archiveurl=https://archive.is/5eCBI|archivedate=4 January 2022|quote=[each volcanic sulphur has a 1/3 chance for .1] Yes.}}

It takes approximately 925 Sulphur to get 30% [[Lovakengj]] [[favour]]. To achieve 100% [[Lovakengj]] [[favour]] approximately 3,804 volcanic sulphur must be mined.

While mining in the sulphur mine, players must wear a form of face protection ([[face mask]], [[gas mask]], or [[slayer helmet]]). Without protection, gas clouds within the mine will deal rapid hits of 3-5 damage per tick to unprotected players. If the player wears any form of protection against them, the damage taken will be reduced to 1-2 per tick instead.

It is recommended to mine the volcanic sulphur deposits from the south or from the west to avoid taking excessive damage since the gas clouds cannot damage you when directly south or west of you. 

Players can extend their stay at the sulphur deposits if they also wear the [[Hitpoints cape|Hitpoints Cape]] and [[Regen bracelet|Regen Bracelet]], as in combination these provide additional [[Healing|natural healing]] (+4 hp/min). 

The sulphur clouds may be safespotted by luring a spider to the western-most sulphur deposit. This can be done by attacking the spider with auto-retaliate off (casting [[curse spells]] or [[Splashing/Guide|splashing]] recommended). The safespot setup requires the player to stand on the west square positioned south of the western most deposit with the spider attacking from the east. This safespot works as long as you do not move, step on the spider, or others players walking on you or the spider. Mining using this safespot will not show the mining animation, but you will continue to mine.
[[File:Western sulphur safespot.png|thumb|Recommended mining safespot location at the furthest west sulphur deposit]]
It is recommended that OSRS Mobile players activate 'tap to drop’ (located within Mobile Controls Settings) whilst afk mining sulphur, as unwanted sulphur can be dropped quickly.

Volcanic sulphur is used along with [[juniper charcoal]], [[saltpetre]], and a [[pot]] to create a [[dynamite pot]], which is then added with a [[ball of wool]] to create [[dynamite]], an item used to participate in the [[blast mine]].
